item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks went back to their losing ways on Thursday as concessions on Trump's trade policy failed to calm investors. Here's what CNBC is watching Friday...

item.title: Buy the dip in these two 'best-in-class' names, strategist Jay Woods says
item.description: Recent pullbacks in Amazon and Goldman Sachs recent may provide a golden opportunity for investors, according to Jay Woods of Freedom Capital Markets.

item.title: Chip stocks just formed a worrying chart pattern
item.description: This year’s moves have led to a bearish chart pattern for the VanEck Semiconductor ETF(SMH).

item.title: A China play that's cheap and has little risk from the trade war — How to play it with options
item.description: Tony Zhang lays out a trade with Baidu.

item.title: State Street teams up with Ray Dalio's Bridgewater on new 'All Weather' ETF
item.description: A version of the Bridgewater strategy, created in 1996, is now available to regular investors in a fund.
